website_summaries.verdict: The best value in a cork/white board combo, but it can be difficult to get it to stay on your wall.
pros: Available in a black or white "curved" plastic frame
Hang it either vertically or horizontally
Has a half cork and half magnetic white board surface
Ships with a dry-erase marker and magnet set
cons: Comes with mounting tape, which some claim does not hold the board up for long
The back of the board also makes it difficult to hang it via other means
Has a marker holder, but no tray

website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive option is perfect for students and families wanting a combo white erase cork board.
pros: Dry erase section of board also functions as a magnet
Comes with a hanging dry erase marker
cons: Many customers complained that the board was exceptionally hard to mount

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money like I did
customer_reviews.text: The seam between the dry erase and cork is completely crooked and doesn't even touch. Of course I didn't notice this until I opened it because it was covered by the packaging. I would not recommend this product. It's very cheaply put together.
customer_reviews.author: BNPhipps

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived the white board was out of place, however it was nothing a little crazy glue couldn't fix. I glued it back into place and it looks great! It comes with 2 magnets, a marker and 4 adhesive strips. I have drywall and they worked great. The marker also has an eraser and magnet so you can stick it to the white board. There is also a small marker holder on top. Overall this is a great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: So easy to hang!
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive combination bulletin board / whiteboard and the framing reflects the price. Nothing fancy, but functional. I opened the box, looked to see what kind of hanger was on the back and there was a package of 3M double sided tape hangers - 4 - one for each corner. I stuck them on and stuck it to the wall and started using it immediately. It came with 2 magnets for the whiteboard side and 1 black marker that has a holder up top. This is exactly what I was after, especially for the price. And it was less than 5 minutes from landing on my doorstep to first use. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: jMoore

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - you’ll thank me later!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived dented and uneven. If you’ve used whiteboards at the office and want something for your household you’ll immediately notice just how poor the quality control is on this product. It’s cheap of course (I paid 12 for mine although now I see it here for 8) and that’s probably a good indication of what to expect. Don’t buy unless you intend to throw away after a few weeks of use IF you can of course deal with all the uneven dents on the surface while writing. You’ve been notified!
customer_reviews.author: AirBender

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PUT THE STICKY PADS ON THE WALL
customer_reviews.text: Put the board on the wall using the provided sticky pads. It fell off the wall in under 24 hours. When it fell off it ripped down the sticky pads with it and it peeled paint off the wall. The sticky pads are very low quality and should not be put on the wall. Now I have to touch up paint the wall in all four places where the pads were. Board itself is fine I guess but don't even want the POS now after this.
customer_reviews.author: Tifani Dulaney

customer_reviews.title: Good board, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, its exactly how it is portrayed. I originally didnt see that it does come with a marker, so I accidently bought a separate pack off them, but ofc that was my fault. Comes with sticky pads for the back so you can attach it to a wall if you dont want to nail anything in like a picture frame. Cork is nice to post up pictures or whatever documents you might want there. Whiteboard is big enough to keep all your errands and reminders for the week.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design
customer_reviews.text: The only way to mount it on the wall is with included double-sided 3m sticky pads. The pads lost adhesion after just a few days it kept falling off the wall. Returned it. Better and cheaper options at your local brick and mortar national retailer. It should have metal brackets to hang on the wall. It does not have any brackets for mounting. It would be overpriced even if it had brackets/proper way to mount on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: John Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose, get what you pay for~
customer_reviews.text: So it was decent for the price, which was mainly why i bought it. Plastic was bit light bordering on flimsy and the cork is pretty thin. I guess for the stick on pads thats used to put it up, it ought to be light though i suppose. It does come with one pen though wich i didnt expect, a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your $$
customer_reviews.text: This was such an awful combination of flimsy materials, they should be embarrassed to produce and sell this item. One of the hazards of purchasing on-line and not getting to actually see and feel the item. Hopefully many people will thke the time to write reviews so other potential customers know if something is worth it or not. I try to do a lot of reviews...both good and bad.
customer_reviews.author: BJA

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these boards and am disappointed. They are very cheaply made. They also do not come with hardware to hang on a wall with nails. They only come with permanent adhesive to stick to walls. I don't want to destroy my walls so I opted to use command strips. Also, when I realized it came with 3M adhesive strips I tried to return them. Amazon will not accept them because of hazardous material or something...I think they must believe the dry erase pen is toxic. I would not recommend it. I would spend the extra money and get one that is more durable and won't ruin your walls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average White/Corkboard..
customer_reviews.text: It's an average white/corkboard, really have no complaints with it's functionality. It's serves it's purpose in that regard pretty well. What I can and will complain about is it's mounting method. They provide 4 pieces of double sided tape. I've had it for less than a month and on average has fallen about once a week - one time was almost on my dog. 2 of the times it's fallen, it hasn't been touched since it was hung back up. The tape appears sticky enough just to hang again, but fails after about a week. Would suggest to add to the mounting method, as what's provided is absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard covered with about 1/32 inch of corkboard.
customer_reviews.text: What a joke! Fortunately for me, Amazon sent me a damaged item; otherwise I would not have known this is just cheap cardboard with a thin layer of corkboard over it. It had been scraped and the plastic film peeled off and a small section of the thin, thin corkboard too, revealing the stupid cardboard under the almost non-existent corkboard. It wouldn't be very long before all of the corkboard would be falling off. If I wanted framed cardboard that would have ended up with little holes all over it, I would have made that myself. I'm returning this pathetic cork imitation.
customer_reviews.author: DSCalvert

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick, and no way to install with screws
customer_reviews.text: The only way to install this whiteboard is to use the double-sided adhesive stickers that come with it. There are no places to nail or screw it into the wall for a sturdier/longer-lasting adhesion. I tried using the adhesive stickers and they stuck for about 10 hours and then have been falling off ever since. This product is not returnable, so that is a pain as well. I don't recommend for anyone to purchase this product. Bummer, because otherwise it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Malfufa

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Basically you get what you pay for. The board is flimsy in the frame is flimsy it doesn’t hang very well. The dry erase markers that are made for this board do not stay magnetized to it very well and are constantly falling off Including the one that And that comes with the board. There is a clip for the pen at the top of the board though but only one pen can clip
customer_reviews.author: erikisnothere

customer_reviews.title: Great but came with a couple dents.
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: The board will not stick anymore and keeps falling down from my door on its own. I don’t have anything on it but written notes on the white board, so I don’t see why it keeps falling off. So, I guess the stickiness only lasts for about 10 months. This product is light weight and easy to put up. I just wish the white board and the cork board would switch sides since I’m left handed. Mine also came with some dents but it doesn’t bug me that much. Also, I wish All the sides were perfectly straight. The two vertical boarders are rounded.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney L.

customer_reviews.title: THE WORSE! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: The idea of the board is good but this? The worse!!! It doesn’t have an actual hanging system on the back of ANY kind, just these 3m double sided tape, which destroys your paint if you happen to try and straighten it and it keeps falling, i fell on top of my brand new mac and i lost it 😠
customer_reviews.author: dasourgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews and it came in beaten up but mine was perfect and its in good quality. It was exactly what I wanted and I got some cute pins and more markers too. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Djslice

customer_reviews.title: Damaged wall, not returnable, will not stay up
customer_reviews.text: All this did is ruin our drywall. It stuck to the wall for 3 days and now it will not stay up. However, the sticky tabs would not peel off the wall so now we have 4 rectangular patches where our drywall peeled. Also, this item is not returnable on Amazon for some reason. So we are just out $18 and now have to repair our wall.
customer_reviews.author: Sean and Jackie N.

customer_reviews.title: Good cork/white board!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect in my little home office corner! The cork board portion is plenty thick enough to push a normal size push pin in, the white side is also magnetic & comes with two small round magnets. Decent product for money & just what I needed! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I mounted it on a curved refrigerator door. The board of course doesn't bend, so I could only use the double adhesive foam pads on the middle top and bottom. I used the foam strips included for packing to stabilize the left and right side of the board. I just glued them to the board backing on each side, and very stable and sturdy. You could also attach the additional adhesive pads to the foam strips.
customer_reviews.author: B2

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. The corkboard is crumbling where it meets the dry erase board. It is not even out of the package, it is not returnable. I gave 1 stars to all areas although I really can not comment on mounting or adhesion capabilities because I have not removed it from the packaging, I have only removed it from the cardboard box it came in. Note... No damage to packing, it was well packed. Update... I decided to use this board since I could not return it. The dry erase pen does not even work- it is completely dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: ANNOYING!!
customer_reviews.text: Days after hanging this dry erase board, we came home to it on the floor and 4 huge holes in the wall. It took the paint and a few layers of the drywall so we now have to patch the wall before we move. ANNOYING!!!! Why no nails? I was annoyed by this when I received it......
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Lyn

customer_reviews.title: nice for my kids' school space
customer_reviews.text: Hey! I purchased 2 of these for my kids' work space for virtual school this year. One mounted nicely and the other fell the same day. Weirdly the one tape stuck to the board, the other stuck to the wall and took the paint off my DRYWALL!! I purchased Command Strips because I can't be loosing chunks of wall, this place is a rental! I'm exceptionally pleased with the boards, just if you worry about your walls skip the mounting tape! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hinmon

customer_reviews.title: no way to hang on wall
customer_reviews.text: The sticky pads seems sticky to the touch. However they refuse to stay stuck on the wall. After repeatedly falling down and the pressing again to hang and applying more force to really make sure it sticks it is still falling down. The worst part is there is no other way to hang this product. To bracket to hang on a nail, not even a lip. The frame is cheap and coming apart on one side. Very disappointing as I do like the spilt style and size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEATLEMANIA. Two is not enough.
customer_reviews.text: I have a home gym and the walls are covered with photos. One corner are all my Beatles stuff. Haphazardly placed with push pins. Until now. Then: Abbey Road section. John Lennon Park in CUBA section. Photos of my bride Gerry and me at Strawberry Fields, Penny Lane, Abbey Road, Mathew St., Dock St. NOW: chaos contained in a handsome array. When Sir Paul accepts my invitation to pump iron, there will only be pride in presentation.
customer_reviews.author: IMAGINE

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Really great value! When I was setting up my home office I needed a white board and was shocked at how much prices had gone up. I guess I’m getting old! This combo looks appealing, is so easy to put up, adheres without a problem, and serves the purpose of an office or family organizing board. I use it for my office and it works great. Later on I plan to get a second one!
customer_reviews.author: FaithHopeYinzer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and don't want to put holes in my walls so i thought this board would be great. I put all 4 of the strips on the back of the board then stuck it to my wall. Not even 24 hours later the board was on the ground. All 4 of the strips were on my wall still. I put it back up and it fell an hour later. I tried taking the strips off my wall and they literally tore the paint and some of the wall off. This board is cheep and i would not recommend it, now my wall is destroyed and I am going to have to pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna May

customer_reviews.title: Mounting System Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this board to enhance my work from home space. The size of the board is fine for what I need. I like the fact that it has a whiteboard and corkboard. However, it would not stay on the wall. The adhesive stickers are not good quality at all. Now I have to figure out how to attach another mechanism for hanging it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Two in One
customer_reviews.text: Holds great but tag board is beginning come off on the edge by the white board side. I do love the fact that it's two in one and it's a not small. I will definitely buy this again if comes down to it and I recommend this to everyone. Now that my little one is learning online from home, it's helped me keep track of his daily schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Cath

customer_reviews.title: Must have for personal note-making.
customer_reviews.text: ~I love love love this board. The tacky portion is sturdy and doesn't allow the tacks to poke through the back. The writing board erases clean and leaves to residue of the marker once erased. Great product. =D ~My LITERALLY only ONE complaint is that theres no way to hand it on your wall UNLESS you use the 3M stickers on the back. Which, if you dont worry about it coming OFF the wall and falling really is no biggy. But, I rent so I'm not aloud to fixate anything to my wall - so I have to use butterfly clips to hold it up with a string.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap materials; but it will serve its purpose (i hope)
customer_reviews.text: The base board (back part; pictured as reference) is made up of cheap box card board, very similar to the amazon boxes we get from our orders here online. The frame is made of plastic, and it it has a free 3M double side tape. For the price, its on the expensive side given the very cheap materials, but you get what you pay for. Anyways, I think it will serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: kwiksilber

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The stickiness of it's mounting system didn't last long. Maybe a month before it fell and sent thumbtacks everywhere. It's also a LOT smaller than I thought it was going to be. It's no bigger than most cork boards in general then add on the fact that it's then half cork board and half dry erase. I definitely think this item should be much bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bechtel

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you don't want to use the sticky tape to secure to your wall.
customer_reviews.text: The board is very cheaply made but having said hat it will be good enough to keep notes etc. My problem with the board is that there is no other way to hang the board if you don't want to stick anything on your walls. The board is very thin and won't support hanging hooks for long. I will keep this board beaus I tried to install hanging hooks and it damaged the board. We will look for a board with a wooden frame that will support hooks.
customer_reviews.author: MJvR

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The board is as described and fit perfectly for my needs. Although you can tell the corkboard side is thin (pretty much made of cardboard behind a thin cork layer), it worked for what I needed. I am going to be placing Disney pins on the cork side. Does not poke through to the other side. Adheres well to the wall I set it up on. Questionable on how much weight this can handle though since it's pretty lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Lam

customer_reviews.title: Great overall
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find this product. I love the cork board/white board combo. Arrived without issue and stays up fine with the sticky tape that was provided. It’s on a painted, slightly textured wall. Even tried to pull it off and it’s stuck on tight. Perfect size for our needs too! Update: After several months the tape no longer sticks and it falls down. I can put it back up but it will fall again after a few minutes. Going to look into another way to mount it because I still really like this!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie E

customer_reviews.title: Like the cork and white board
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 85 yr old father for his room in assisted living. I hung a calendar on the cork side -and use the white board to write notes to staff and for his therapists to leave me notes or use magnet to post business card.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When combined with 3M Picture hangers and sticky hooks, this is a perfect addition to my home office
customer_reviews.text: finally got around to installing this board. Did not use provided double sided tape, used 3M Medium size Picture hangers instead because I didnt want the wall damaged if I decide to take the board off for any reason. Put a few 3M command sticky hooks on each of the vertical sides to hold misc cables for my computing needs, This board works very well to tack up notes and write down phone numbers. A very handy addition to my SOHO
customer_reviews.author: WmGoatHuntleyIL

customer_reviews.title: Organization-Step 1
customer_reviews.text: Organization - Step 1 Bought this to try to keep family of four in the loop. In addition to the calendar, this board let’s us write to each other important dates, lists, and just kind notes to one another. We were always forgetting to tell each other things - schedule changes, running out of things, important dates. At a glance, we can stay on top of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great product, value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, at a good price. Made of nice material. Doesn't seem cheap. Sturdy and strong. Comes with a duster and 2 magnets as well. I would have liked it to be slightly bigger as the area is reduced buy half on each. Still love the product, very happy! Both halves work well. The strength of the magnets could have been better. Pinboard works as expected. Doesn't come with pins though.
customer_reviews.author: Aashna Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: Do not use the mounting adhesive that comes with this board. It fell off the wall after and hour and product was not very heavy at all. The cork side is very thin so do not think about using regular push pins on this. Goes right through the back. However the dry erase side is good. Used it a few times and so far no pen stains. Overall board is made poorly but that’s the value you get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KH2000

customer_reviews.title: the sticky pads are not permanent and will fall off the wall, the paint stays on the wall but the pads fall off.
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea more than the product. It was suppose to be permanently sticking to the wall but it kept falling off instead. I work from home most evenings and this was suppose to help me stay organized using the calk side for my calendar to hang, and the dry erase side to keep my schedule in view. But it keeps falling off the wall so none of this is relevant now.
customer_reviews.author: V C Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great size and awesome construction
customer_reviews.text: The board is really good for an at home study or cubicle. Be sure to purchase 3M mounting strips as the sticky adhesive strips that come with the board aren't high quality. The board was on the wall for less than two days and fell off of my wall twice, taking wall paint with it. The cork board is good quality and the whiteboard doesn't stain. The board comes with a holder for the dry erase marker that comes with the unit. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Antonette

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed wall
customer_reviews.text: The mounting didn’t last a day and completely ripped the paint and plaster off my walls... this really sucks. I’m not sure why this adhesive just didn’t work the whole thing was down by the time I got home From work. Didn’t even last 24 hours. And it’s destroyed my wall. Beware of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzia

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this to use at my office to make ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use at my office to make my life just a little bit easier. I am constantly writing myself post it notes and then misplacing them. The whiteboard serves as my "note to self area and the cork board is used for important notes that I need to reference back to. I also use the magnetic pieces to hold up some smaller notes on the whiteboard side. Needless to say my board is always covered and surprisingly well organized.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harp

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The board was easy to hang with the strips provided. Great for reminders and whatnot. It's the perfect size for above my computer desk. Pegboard does not come with pushpins, but comes with dry erase marker for the whiteboard side, and two colorful magnets. Only the whiteboard side is magnetic. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bows and won't stay stuck to wall
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these and none of them will stick to the wall. I have a very flat textured wall so it should be fine. I attach other things to the wall just fine but it is, in fact, because the middle bows out from top to bottom and pulls on the adhesive stickers. All 4 of them have fallen! I actually love the board otherwise but....it won't stick to the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put over my desk. I love that it has a dry erase board and also a cork board. Great idea ! It adheres well to the wall ( I used command strips instead of the adhesive it came with to adhere to the wall ). It is easy to keep clean and I would definitely recommend it !!
customer_reviews.author: Yazzgirl

customer_reviews.title: It's Just OK.
customer_reviews.text: I had one like this a few years ago and it was a lot more sturdy. This one is extremely lightweight - which can be a good thing - you don't even need hardware - it just comes with adhesive to stick to the wall. But with that said it is very flimsy and you definitely can't put anything heavy on it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For The Price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom in her assisted living room. Now she/we can make notes for things needed and such, phone numbers and the menu for the week. Things like that. Uses 3M double sided sticky so install is a breeze. One black erase pen included. You will need to buy a dry eraser also and stick pins.
customer_reviews.author: llacosse

customer_reviews.title: Mounting strips don't work well
customer_reviews.text: Product is overall good but it doesnt mount well with included strips and when it fell the border cracked. Seems better now that i used my own mounts
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I need
customer_reviews.text: Despite having the dimensions in the description, it is smaller than I originally anticipated. I am returning it only due to its size. I think that this would be a good starter board to use. I did not open mine, however I can see the obvious break in the cork-board side, when I thought it would just be one piece of cork. I think overall you are paying for the quality you get. It is one of the cheaper items on Amazon, and it translates into the material. Like I said previously, I would keep it but I do need a bigger board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute board
customer_reviews.text: Cute board for both maker or pins, it is thinnEr than the usual boards, I notice the pins was sticking out at the back when I got scratched....So the back is not thin wood it just cardboard, becareful when using pins so doesn't go through the back.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed 🙏

customer_reviews.title: Works well in home office
customer_reviews.text: The frame, cork and dry erase board arrives in perfect condition. It advertised the box included a marker, magnets and adhesive mounting pads. The adhesive mounting pads were marked as permanent. I didn’t want to damage my wall in the future when I need to move it, so I decided to use some Command picture hanging strips to hang it up. They worked perfectly. I’m happy with my purchase. It also had a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love having a big white board in my home. I like to put a bill checklist, and daily to-dos in a place that I always look. It keeps me motivated to do more around the house! I definitely recommend this for any needs, it is of great quality, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: cody garrett

customer_reviews.title: Don't try to stick to textured walls
customer_reviews.text: The 4 sticky pads that come with it DO NOT stick to walls with any texture. I had to put up two picture hooks and slide the frame of the board on to them so that it would stay up. Other than that, the whiteboard and corkboard are decent.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on the wall.
customer_reviews.text: The board is great but it won’t stay on the wall. The only thing hanging on the board has been one sheet of paper and that is not enough to make it fall off of the wall. I plan to replace the sticky things that came on it with command strips. Hopefully that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: This board is sleek-looking and the perfect size. Not too big, not too small. Just enough space to put a few notes, pins, magnets, etc. I was a bit surprised that it doesn't have loops for hanging on the back...but the double-sided tape keeps you from having to put holes in your wall. I haven't tried removing it yet, so not sure if it would peel the paint. But I'm not really worried about it at this point. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good board, bad adhesive!
customer_reviews.text: The board works fine as a corkboard and whiteboard. The adhesive is not good, half of the foam was stuck to the wall and the other half was stuck to the board when it fell off in the middle of the night. I tried to put it back up, and fell within a couple of hours. The adhesive they send with this is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Pfohlio

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but doesn't stick to the wall
customer_reviews.text: Great for my boys school work. Will NOT stick to the wall, though, with the provided double sided tape. I had to nail some wall hangers into it to stay.
customer_reviews.author: KLeDoux

customer_reviews.title: Needs better hanging method
customer_reviews.text: I would not count on their hooks to mount this. It came unstuck within 20 minutes despite making sure the surface was clean and dry. However once I installed some other hooks and screwed it in more securely it works great.
customer_reviews.author: JMSolko

customer_reviews.title: First impression was not great
customer_reviews.text: Product was hand to me. Box was in good condition. Once I opened it. I found it was bent on to sections. The whiteboard material has a bow to it now. First impression not great. But the product let's me use it for what I needed. Just was to buy another one to appreciate it better.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Works but not Magnetic
customer_reviews.text: Board itself is great and does most of what it's supposed to do. The product description said Magnetic but this is not Magnetic. Some variation might be but the white board / tack combo I purchased is not Magnetic regardless of the description. Did not bother to return it as I needed it and happy with it's size.
customer_reviews.author: Leejo

customer_reviews.title: Simple and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This little board is perfect for me. It have it hanging next to my desk for little reminders, etc. It’s nice that it comes with 2 magnets, and a dry erase pen. I had the push pins on hand.
customer_reviews.author: VDW23

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: amazon really did well with the customer service on this one. I did not authorize this purchase & i received the item ( to be returned as i have no use for it i can think of right now) & they refunded me. tHe actual product is great and looks just as described , i like the half cork and half dry eraser, really hard for me to find that where i am and the price is a DEAL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Williams

customer_reviews.title: no way to mount item
customer_reviews.text: the item ( i bought two ) has only adhesive tape no other way to mount item on wall....no hooks or hanging apparatus. When I awoke in the morning the adhesive gave out and the cork/white board was on the floor. I adhered it to a clean white wall...will not stick...no other hanging device but two sided sticky tape is included with item. Horribly disappointing. This teacher has no way to hang two of these.
customer_reviews.author: molly rousseau

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second dry erase / cork board that I have purchased from ACCO. I like it. Not too big or to small. I can attach paperwork to it or use the dry erase side for notes and things of that nature. It has pre-attached sticky's on the back in all four corners. They are really sticky too! The reason I bought a second one is because I couldn't get the first one off the wall I stuck it too without risk of peeling paint that sort of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a small area, the size is perfect but the packaging it came in was messy and horrible, the tape they used all over EVERYTHING left a film that I had to scrub off, there was a scratch in the cork material and a flaw on the white board. It very well could have been during shipping but still a little disappointed. The product otherwise is what I hoped for, just wish it didn’t arrive appearing to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmin

customer_reviews.title: Don't rely on the white board pen included.
customer_reviews.text: Board looks nice, hung up nicely, but pen supplied with the board was dried out and did not write...at all. Left me in a bind because I wanted to write a note to my new roommates and I couldn't. I had relied on the pen being new and in working order. It wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend buying this item!
customer_reviews.text: Should have known from price this was not very sturdy. I mounted it on the wall, but did not place any paper notes, push pins, etc on it and two days later I heard it fall to the floor! Because the frame is thin plastic, I am not sure how else it can be mounted. Not pleased with this item! Useless!
customer_reviews.author: MsDiz

customer_reviews.title: Great except...
customer_reviews.text: I love this board, it has become quite handy. The dry erase board is also magnetic which is useful as well. I'm only giving this a 4 star rating because the only way to hang this up is by double sided sticky pads that are strong enough to take the paint off of the wall. Because of this, I decided to use mounting tacky putty which keeps the walls protected and also stays sturdy on the wall. Otherwise great product!
customer_reviews.author: HB is all you can see

customer_reviews.title: Great for notes and ideas
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for organizing ideas and notes during the pandemic. As work or school from home. Easy to hang as it is not that heavy. The size is good and doesn't take much space Good for home office
customer_reviews.author: Cowwyhippoandbubu

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board a communication board for work. I am a restaurant manager. It is great because I can post reports on the caulk board side and then write communications on the white board side. It has really helped at getting my staff engaged about what is going on in the store. It’s sticks really well and has stayed in place with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Depka

customer_reviews.title: Great design but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The design and size is perfect for my study space. I thought the adhesives were easy to use and mount, however after a week, my cork board was too heavy for the adhesive and continues to fall off. It would be better if there were nails or something more efficient to hang. The adhesive tape is useless in my opinion and doesn’t hold up the board. I have to invest in a command strip velcro and spend more money possibly to fix this or just toss it. I was excited to use this, but I have to be honest, I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on end/side of tower cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and fits perfect on the end wall of a tower cabinet. Eye level and easy to read. Ended up using 4 bigger velcro pads to mount so all 4 corners don't move. Plastic frame was slightly bowed from top to bottom so a couple of bumper pads, 1 each side in the middle keep it from flexing when push pins or write on board.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Okay board, not okay mounting
customer_reviews.text: The white board erases okay and overll looks decent. Couldn't get it to stay up though and have to hang it a different way. The cork is just a thin lay with cardboard below, but it does what it's supposed to at least.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Nice big white board at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This white board is a nice bigger size and great for the new “home schooling” we are doing. We bought extra dry erase pens. Nothing to complain about - it works well and hasn’t gotten stained (cleans up well)
customer_reviews.author: flim viewer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Wish the back had a hanging mount. The stickiness does not hold so it falls off my wall over and over. I have to add something to the back for a better hold. It’s still a good product. Just not the adhesive on the back.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: won't stay on the wall
customer_reviews.text: this is a cute little board and perfect for my needs, but it won't stay on the wall. I'll keep it I guess, but I'll have to figure out some way to hang it because the adhesive won't hold it up
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. Burkheart

customer_reviews.title: I love the board BUT THE TAPE SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered Command Strips online because after a week the double sided tape that came with the board and it fell and ripped of my dry wall. After replacing it with Command Strips and it worked perfect and so sturdy. So be careful with the tape!
customer_reviews.author: hellokeo

customer_reviews.title: Adhesion isn’t good
customer_reviews.text: The board itself is great however the adhesive tape on the back does not stick well to a lot of surfaces and when it does, it sticks on and removed paint. I use command strips for adhesion and those work better.
customer_reviews.author: edili

customer_reviews.title: Terrible marker.
customer_reviews.text: Marker that comes with it is terrible. Would prefer an alternative to adhesion when mounting so that it doesn’t mess up the paint so terribly when I go to remove. Brand name is upside down because I chose to mount it with the whiteboard on the left since I am left handed.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE THE ADHESIVE THAT IS PROVIDED WITH THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good product and I had it up in my apartment the whole but when it was time to move out and take this down, it also removed al the paint off my walls. I encourage you to use you own adhesive strips when using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dexrala

customer_reviews.title: Complete Trash
customer_reviews.text: Total and complete junk. The first one I received was damaged on arrival, and Amazon quickly sent another. However when I received the replacement, it too was damaged. The cork is thin and tears easily. The white board slides back and forth and catches the cork and tears it up. I am looking into other options. You get what you pay for with this for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I mean if you want them to go up on your wall, these aren’t it!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved pretty much everything about the product except how we’re suppose to mount to the wall with double stick tape. I wanted to hang these above my kids desk (i purchased TWO)..... yea they BOTH keep falling!! Now to figure out how to keep these up or defeats the purpose as to why i got them in the first place!
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Solis

customer_reviews.title: Good board, but don’t use mounting tabs it comes with.
customer_reviews.text: The “permanent” 3M stickers that came with it didn’t work well for me. My board fell down during the night after I mounted it... pulling off a piece of the wall with one of the stickers. BUT I put the board back up with separately purchased 3M velcro and that has worked with no issues for the past couple weeks and thus overall the board serves the purpose I wanted it to, I just wish I had mounted it with the velcro to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Karyzini

customer_reviews.title: Weak Adhesive
customer_reviews.text: The board itself is great quality, what I had trouble with is the adhesive strip on the back of it that is supposed to hold the board up. It was weak and the board would randomly fall. I would put it back up again and again and eventually the adhesives stopped working all together. If you have some double-sided tape or another way to help it stay up then I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Slike

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive strips are used to attach to wall
customer_reviews.text: There are no hooks to hang this with. It comes with 4 adhesive strips (not the removable kind) for attachment to the wall. We use it in elderly MIL's room to remind her of medications and appts.
customer_reviews.author: Kin_finder

customer_reviews.title: Cleared up a lot of clutter
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get the clutter off of my refrigerator and this worked out quite well. A place to stick receipts and appointment cards and a nice place to leave a note for other members of the house. Every kitchen should have one. I love it. I would suggest buyers to purchase Command strips to hang this up. They do supply an adhesive strip, but I wanted something I could remove cleanly. Could be that I am just picky.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: VERY light plastic border. Crappy materials. Also, it stuck on the wall for about 20 mins before falling. There are no other hanging holes or attachments... so... its useless.
customer_reviews.author: Haley K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This one came with sticky adhesive that you press onto the wall. Was super easy and quick to put up. I dont like that you can't take it down and write on it, but I'll get used to it. I love this thing and it was a great price. Very handy and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good board and price
customer_reviews.text: Mine did arrive with a dent in the surface but customer service responded quickly with a refund. Overall good board. Magnets work and markers stick and surface erases well. I did not mount mine so can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it was intended for. Erases well and the magnet on the marker holds it onto the white board just fine. Easy peel and stick adhesive backing makes for a 10-second install. Can be mounted vertical or horizontal. For the money, a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No complaints, recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for the memo board we wanted! Comes with a marker with a very thin tip, a place to keep the pen on top, 2 magnets, and mounting foam stick ons. We used command strips to make sure we didn't damage the wall. Easy to hang, very lightweight so that helps! FYI, tacks don't go in all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shoppers

customer_reviews.title: Those self-stick pads are SUPER sticky!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Very convenient for my dorm room. FYI, you only have one shot at putting this board on the wall because those stickys are indeed very sticky. Trying to remove this board from the wall feels impossible. Pulling on the board hard enough once you've stuck it may cause the frame and/or one of the boards to snap, so be cautious for that.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Terrible adhesive included
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive that was included with the board failed to keep the board from falling off of my wall but managed to rip off some of the paint along with it. Would not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: 👍🏽

customer_reviews.title: Nice dry-erase board
customer_reviews.text: This board works well for my application. I added dry-erase board dividing tape to complete the grid on my project, and used magnets also to complete my project. Nice size, and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr ATC

customer_reviews.title: Nice for it’s price
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is well made and nice. It feels cheap because it’s very light but it is perfect quality for it’s price. I use one half for my keychain collection display and the other half as my event board for the week However the packing it came in is very big and a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wfh
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my wfh office situation. Nice size,not too big and not too small. The adhesive they gave fit perfectly (with a little alteration). Happy I purchased
customer_reviews.author: A Furmom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay flat.
customer_reviews.text: When I got it, it was flat and now a month since I got it it’s starting to curve. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: MWDSoCal

customer_reviews.title: Great For Keeping Track of Tasks
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount, came within a reasonable time, looks good. I'm really happy with it. I just wish I payed attention to see if the whiteboard was magnetic (which it's not) but it still functions as it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Hauvek

product_meta.title: Quartet Combination Magnetic Whiteboard & Corkboard, 17" x 23", Combo White Board & Cork Board, Curved Frame, Perfect for Office & Home Decor, Home School Message Board, Black (41723-BK)
product_meta.description: Size:17" x 23"| Style:Combo (Black Curved Frame)Combine your dry-erase board and bulletin board into one with this magnetic combination board. This magnetic combo board is half cork and half dry-erase to provide versatility of two surfaces. Use push pins to tack up items on the natural cork side. Use the dry-erase side to write notes or hang items with magnets, which eliminates pin holes! This 17” x 23” board can be hung vertically or horizontally using the included self-stick pads. A dry-erase marker and magnet accessories are also included. Stylish and simple, the curved plastic frame is black.
feature_bullets: Combination board offers both writing and display functionality; Ideal for light, personal use
17 Inches x 23 Inches; Curved, black plastic frame adds design simplicity
Combo board surface is half cork and half dry erase
Self stick pads are included for easy hanging
Hang vertically or horizontally to fit your space
Dry erase marker and magnet Accessories Included; 60 day warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,458 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
